content.detailedDescription: Wife and i saw a legitimate ufo tonight...Walking in the south mountain reeservation around 7pm on oct 17th 2016. a bright white ball of light flew over us silently, its illumination was bright white and steady. it banked east and headed over the ridge and towards nyc. we watched it fly up and away and out of sight. it was clearly not a plane or helicopter, blimp or drone or satellite or star. very strange event.
content.summary: A bight white sphere flew over our heads turned and headed east towards nyc

content.detailedDescription:
Approximately 2040 hours i entered the hot tub on the back deck of my house all exterior lights were off providing a good view of the night sky. clear night no wind. observed a jet plane from north to south travel while watching noticed a bright light appear over the western mt. range. i am 85 mile west of d.C. in the shenandoah valley, va live in a 3 mile wide valley with large mountain rages to the east and west. the bright light resembled a helicopter with the search lights on but seemed to be brighter moving slowly to the east in a straight line. turned off the ho tub jets with nothing audible the night was completely quite. light was huge and appeared to be low flying about the height of a helicopter. i couldn't make out a shape due to the brightness of the light. traveled halfway across the sky and abruptly turned 90 degrees and accelerated speed dramatically straight away from me quickly growing smaller and smaller to a pin point and then nothing. acceleration viewing about 3-4 seconds from a large white/amber light to nothing.
i've seen unexplained lights in the sky but this one defies logic with the movement, change of direction and extreme acceleration in speed. left me stunned for a long while.
content.summary: Bright white/amber light no other marking lights noted. non blinking solid same color came over mountain range. thought maybe it was a helicopter but no sound large light very bright. halfway across sky 90 degree direction change with extreme rapid ascent

content.detailedDescription: A friend called me an hour after the event. in virginia beach, va, approx 755pm they and their son saw a bright object in the nw sky. it was dark but no clouds. the object looked like an orange comet going up. had a tail like a comet. no sound was ever heard. the whole sighting lasted 4 to 5 minutes. a couple minutes in it disappeared, then reappeared without the tail. there were a few bright lights, maybe a cylinder shaped object. the round lights were very bright. when it reappeared it was going in an eastward horizontal direction toward the ocean. it was not fast. moving slowly then it just disappeared and did not reappear. did anyone else see?
content.summary: Upwards, orange comet like tail in nw disappeared reappeared horizontal dir, no tail few bright lights eastward

content.detailedDescription: Taking trash can out. notice this glowing light in sw sky. got binoculars out then small telescope. in telescope could see red on bottom white to yellow in middle then green to blue on top. thought it could be a drone ppl buy and fly but noticed it had no flashing lights and was so stable. watched it for 20 minutes expecting to see it go down because drones have limited flight time and also noticed it was moving away from us and getting smaller.Roof tops started getting in the way so we drove to better spot to continue watching. it finally moved so far away we lost on the horizon moving to fort worth. this object appeared to change shapes from a sphere to triangle all while changing color red being most dominant. could see the layers of color as being described before. was not a plane or drone. was interesting to see and could not believe how long we watched it
content.summary: Hovered but appeared moving slowly away. shape change round to triangle multi colored

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Wow

i have always been interested in ufo's and recently took photos of a ufo near the iss on the live feed.

so ever since i have been looking up.

i saw something high up like a kite but way to far up and maybe a bird and while i was staring at it in sydney's hot and blue sky - underneath that object that was something man-made was one of those crafts that are triangular with 3 pulsating white lights and it's like it was malfunctioning with its cloaking device and was translucent but could still see the triangle shape and an orb bot coming from the west going east.

i was in awe and shock and excitement. i am not on drugs or hallucinated that because my father saw the last one zoom by at incredible speed.

i'm actually having anxiety and when i saw the craft and then the orb with it that was soooo bright i yelled out to my father to come and look - by this time the triangle and it was not all translucent - it was like a cloaking device bubbling and changing around it - like it failed to cloak it completely. and it was escorted with an orb at a speed just a little faster than a plane.

but the other 2 orbs zoomed past from the same direction from west to east and only like a kilometre away in the sky. right in front of me.

dad finally came out and missed the 3rd one and saw the last and most brightest flying a straight path to where the other to went i assume.

i never seen anything like this before and only on youtube. had i have video taped it - it would have been the best footage ever in a sunny blue sky and i lost sight of them all as there is a double story house nextdoor to our left and they all disappeared behind the big house and could not spot them anymore. 

i always believed in them and have seen 8 orbs with 150+ people in 1988 in fairfield, sydney australia ..

but i never seen a craft with white balls underneath it pulsating and around the middle and top it was like it was having trouble going invisible

i am absolutely shocked ... in a good way - but i don't think my friend s will believe me unless they ask my dad.
content.summary: 4 of them - one was a spacecraft - the other 3 were orbs - one was moving with huge craft - other 2 zoomed past from west to east

content.detailedDescription: It happens almost every night around the same time. i walk outside between 10pm-2:30am est. time. it will sit there as i sit in my sun room hovering over the trees. i got curious and walked in the field behind my house and every time i tried to get a closer look the object would start to move where i would barely be able to see it like it's watching me. it used to not come often but it has been happening a lot lately. like it can tell i am watching it or when it does go lower than the tree line it just disperse and reappears. i dont know exactly what it is. it's not a drone, nore a plane.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Overly large light(not a star) hovers-ascends-descends

content.detailedDescription: I was at my computer playing a game in my off-campus dorm when my roommate called me out to the porch, saying i should come look at something. after about 20 seconds i went outside to see what looked like a orange-yellow light in the sky south east of us. he began to tell me how he's on the phone with his girlfriend who's at the academic commons on campus of salisbury university. she and a bunch of other students were looking at this light in the sky before i came out and were debating what it was since it was unusual. his girlfriend thought it was a shooting start but that is preposterous as when i went outside to look at it it was standing still and hovering. my roommate took about 15 seconds to describe what's aforementioned to me and i spend the next 50 seconds or so observing the object. i told him he should try to take a picture, but his camera was not good enough to take a night photo of it. i thought i started to see very slight movement from the object; it was flickering/twinkling like you would expect a star, but then i questioned if it was moving to my roommate. he said it was moving earlier, and that it was vanishing then reappearing, and so did his girlfriend. after observing it shortly and deducing it was slowly moving, i observed it began to dim slightly, then vanished from the sky. as of this writing, about 45 min from writing this, i have not seen it again since. i believe i witnessed the object for about 1 min 20 seconds, but it was in the sky before i witnessed it and other people where already looking at it, i.E. my roommate, his girlfriend, and anonymous other people with her at our university's new building. this sighting is particularity important to me because i observed a similar albeit red/orange orb in sarasota florida that vanished almost 2 years ago while i was on vacation; i reported that sighting, case #64427. i never thought i would see anything else like it until now. it's amazing other people saw it this time with me too.
content.summary: Observed yelllow/orange star-like object hover, slowly begin moving, dimmed then vanished

content.detailedDescription:
I reside in the countryside. i let my kittens out of the barn in the morning as usual. i always throw a ball for them to chase. i also throw the ball into the air and catch it. when i threw the ball up into the air i saw an object i couldn't identify. i am a retired flight attendant and know my aircraft and this was not an aircraft i would know. i felt scared, isolated even more than i already was, and anxious for what may happen to me.  i pulled out my phone and took 3 pics. the object was moving and i did not know if i got it but i see in my 3rd photo it is there. but so are two other objects under it and to the left in the sky. i'm not sure what these other two objects are and i never saw these at the time i watched and photographed the object.
i watched the object move across the sky but i could not see at all where exactly it went.
i wondered at the time if it just disappeared.  i felt in my heart as though i was witnessing something very extraordinary.  the object made me sense that it was not from earth, as though i was supposed to have the highest respect for it. in this regard i felt below its status, almost unimportant in the realm of my own life. this scared me and still does.  as it moved like a mighty ship across the sky, it would not take a straight path but a path that seemed to have spots where it could slow down a bit. it was not speeding or even going fast. more leisurely, as though to observe. when i lost sight of it i felt drained of energy. i worry now i may see it again but i hope not.
content.summary: I threw s ball into the air when i saw object.  it scared me but i got a pic.

content.detailedDescription: I noticed the hovering parallel three amber lights as soon as i walked outside.  i watched the hovering lights until i approached my vehicle. it was very odd because it was not moving and i have never seen a flying object with three semetrical lights prior.  i opened my vehicle door, grabbed the item that i needed and looked back up, the object was completely gone.  there was aight of it anywhere that i could see.
content.summary: Hovered for a few minutes then completely disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Directly across the street from where i live facing due west at around 10:30 pm, i noticed something familiar in the otherwise clear sky. i immediately pointed it out to my neighbor as we were heading towards the car. it looked like a smoke ring-perhaps 30 feet in diameter, but seemed to consist of cloud. there are no chimney's or smoke stacks on either building that i am aware of. this was see through in the center. it was stationary between two buildings-a one story and a two story over a parking lot area. it had no solid structure to it whatsoever in that there was no evidence of a solid object being there such as metal, glass, wings or actual lights. around the perimeter of this oval shaped ring were much smaller and a more dense/thick  cloud matter that was perfectly round in shape and spaced equidistant around the ring.These seemed to have a little bit more of a brightness to them without giving off any actual light.My neighbor and i stood and marveled at it for about 1 minute at that time of the sighting. i shared that i had seen this same thing in the same general area several times in the past about 3 years prior. it was in basically the same area. i saw it from approximately a half a block further away from an easterly direction facing again facing west from my balcony. i suggested that it appeared as if there was something solid there that was possibly cloaked, for lack of a better term, that would have been a disc-shaped object that had lights around the perimeter but everything of the thing that might have been made of solid material, ie. a structured craft, was somehow being cloaked. it was too perfect in shape to be just clouds and too detailed in appearance to be some sort of mist or fog. my neighbor agreed that the way i thought of it as being a cloaked object that was in actuality solid but not able to be detected as a solid object resonated as what it appeared it could be.We moved the car into the garage and  decided to walk back to study it again. it hadn't changed or moved from what we could tell in the 1-2 minutes it was out of our field of vision. we stared at it again from about 1 minute and returned to our building.
content.summary: I cloud-like smoke ring with perfect round and more solid cloud material equidistant around perimeter.

content.detailedDescription:
Several days ago october2016, i spotted an orb glowing very bright and the size of a golf ball just hovering in the air about 30' from the ground(caught on tape). as you look at the video, you can see an image on the ground of a person with an alien shaped head. two days later i could see something moving slowly in camera view near tree, looked like a figure eight. it's lights we're going downwards about 6" into this figure eight & back up into the light that's aiming into the tree. the power lines are about 25' away from this tree.
today 10/17/16 at 3am you can see another image of a long stream of light with bands of rings aiming towards a tree. it looks like it's 2 flashlights but as you look at it, you know it's not a flashlight (ne). it lasted till 7am this morning. i found several fallen branches laying in the yard.
content.summary: Orbs show up on surveillance camera one day and now streams of light with several rings aim towards a tree all caught in camera!

content.detailedDescription: While outside to fill my bird feeder at about 19:35 hrs,give or take a minute,  "hunter's moon" just coming up in the east, clear sky with stars, i noticed this bright object just sitting there where no stars were just fifteen minutes earlier when i was out there.  as i looked at it i noticed two very small red blinking lights near it (i did not see them ejected from the object). i cannot say for sure if the red lights were connected to the object in any way or were some satellites that were much higher up than the object.  as the small red blinking lights moved sw, the object began to slowly move away to a spot right above my house. at this point i knew this was a ufo. its speed was about that of a small plane and i would estimate between 7,000 and 10,000 feet up. there was absolutely no sound at all from the object. i have never seen anything quite like this object.  its luminosity did not change at all, nor did its speed as it headed se in a straight line.  as it continued over my house to the se i watched in amazement as the object began to dim, and then fade away as it continued on its path, until it was completely gone.  it was like some kind of 'cloaking device.'  there were no planes in the area at that time, although i am on the direct flight path from greene airport in warwick, ri, where the normal paths are nw to se, se to nw.
content.summary: Stationary brilliant star-like object nw of my house.

content.detailedDescription:
Multiple siting photos - just was able to upload photos from september-october nightly sightings

mufon came by to get original copies of some photos last month, but i have yet to hear back. as we were unable to upload photos (0.01 upload speeds for over a month) i've decided to upload numerous photos from sightings not reported as well.

i was told it wasn't necessary unless we had video - there is now 1 video as well.

i have more photos but am waiting to see if these load.

the 2 with the humanoid figure on the bottom left have been enhanced to show the figure more clearly.
content.summary: Multiple siting photos - just was able to upload photos from september-october nightly sightings

content.detailedDescription:
Multiple siting photos - just was able to upload photos from september-october nightly sightings

mufon came by to get original copies of some photos last month, but i have yet to hear back. as we were unable to upload photos (0.01 upload speeds for over a month) i've decided to upload numerous photos from sightings not reported as well.

i was told it wasn't necessary unless we had video - there is now 1 video as well.

i have more photos but am waiting to see if these load.

the 2 with the humanoid figure on the bottom left have been enhanced to show the figure more clearly.
content.summary: Multiple siting photos - just was able to upload photos from september-october nightly sightings

content.detailedDescription: Not able to sleep i finally got up in my bedroom. i was waiting for my mom to awake to talk to after a bad night of dreams. when i looked out my big window on the second floor to the sky at the stars fascinated with space it seemed as if one began to move but as i watched it soar across the sky from horizon to horizon i realized it was not normal not a plane it strobed blinked and zig zagged across by disappearing and reappearing very quickly and traveled across impossible speed until it was too far to see. i know what i saw was a spaceship! it seamed as if it were falling and immediately lifting its self as it traveled very unstable but was seriously flying towards its destination. very fast impossible
content.summary: It disappeared and reappeared in different places as it traveled across the sky so high as if it were in space above the atmosphere. dipped and looked unstable but fast

content.detailedDescription:
I was going to dinner while attending nmmi. i was standing in formation outside of the mess hall when someone pointed out something in the sky. we all (about 15 of us) could see a figure 8 type of craft that was sideways. 
someone went and grabbed a pair of binoculars and we all took turns looking at the craft. 
the craft hovered for about 3 seconds after we all saw it and then very slowly started moving towards the se. we all started arguing about what we were seeing because we couldn't believe that all of us were seeing this ufo and it looked like nothing any of us had ever seen or heard of before. 
i don't know what happened to the craft because we needed to go in and eat. 
no one talked about it after that.
content.summary: Figure 8 shape sideways. hovered and slowly moved forward to the se. 10+ witnesses

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
It was about 9 ish pm and we were taking pics of the full moon ( in august 2016). we looked at the pics later and noticed this strange shape that moved from pic 1 to the last pic. it was very bright and seems changing directions. check pics. we were thinking it could be lantern paper but the shape is very odd ( check pics) 
thanks
content.summary: Ufo above san francisco?

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
It was about 9 ish pm and we were taking pics of the full moon ( in august 2016). we looked at the pics later and noticed this strange shape that moved from pic 1 to the last pic. it was very bright and seems changing directions. check pics. we were thinking it could be lantern paper but the shape is very odd ( check pics) 
thanks
content.summary: Ufo above san francisco?

content.detailedDescription: Just after midnight in my san diego neighborhood, i went outside to smoke. when i looked up, i noticed a glowing orange light, like a fireball. first i thought it might be a helicopter or plane, but the lights were all wrong. this was glowing orange and made no sound. it was first hovering then slowly floated from east to west. it wasn't a meteor or comet, it left no trail and moved too slow for that. i took a picture and some video of it. i've never seen anything like it before and i've seen plenty of aircraft and meteor showers to tell the difference. it freaked me out.
content.summary: Just after midnight saw a glowing orange light hovering then moving south west of me

content.detailedDescription: I was at a friends house in the countryside and were having dinner.  out on the porch my friend told me to come out and see these strange lights that he had witnessed a few nights before.  we observed bright red lights to the south, all perfectly lined up horizontally and evenly spaced from one another.  they were slowly moving in an eastward direction.  he said that when he first saw the lights, he presumed they were b1 bombers heading to ellsworth afb in rapid city, sd.  however the objects were moving extremely slow and making absolutely no sound.  although it was very dark out, it did seem to have an outline and could have been 1 solid object with 5 lights rather than multiple objects, but i cannot be 100% sure of this.  it slowly drifted east for about 15 minutes and then the lights disappeared.  we were all very astonished and in a state of disbelief.
content.summary: 5 bright red lights in a straight line formation slowly moving to the east making no sound.

content.detailedDescription: I was in infantry training on ft benning ga. the first day half of our platoon went out then the second day the rest of the platoon would be taken out for the training. at the end of the first day the first half came back going on and on about a ufo. i wasn't there so i thought they were mistaken or outright making up stories. the second day my half went out to the training grounds. two or three people from the first day also came out with us. within a half hour we stated hearing a loud buzzing sound. the men who were there the first day start yelling " it's coming its coming that's the noise we heard it make the whole time". sure enough about 50 ft over the tree tops comes this chrome metallic sphere. the buzzing was loud. like it had a motor going inside it. though the sphere looked complete. i couldn't see any openings or ports. it would follow us hovering and then changing direction andnheading. though it always kept us in line of sight. sometimes it would go so far out and up that we couldn't hear the buzzing and could barely see the glint of the chrome in the sun. at least a qt mile out. i always thought it was a drone. this was 2005 so drone designs were coming out every day. i thought for sure some day i would get an explanation. i always was sure it was our own military using my platoon as training for this object. the funny part is the closest thing to someone else seeing something like that and matching my story was a ufo encounter. but i'm still sure your going to read this and go "yea yea it's some "never made it" us drone design". if that is the case sorry for wasting your time. if itnwasn't for my buddy hearing my story and making me fill out reports i never would have said anything. i mean it was like 11 years ago.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Chrome sphere size of beach ball. loud buzzing sound. following my platoon during training over the course of two days

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside on my deck looking at the horizon when i noticed a very bright, pure white light in the west.  it appeared like an orb, or spherical in shape and moved at what appeared to be a constant speed (somewhat similar to a commercial aircraft).  at first i thought it was a plane as i have dozens passing over my house and nearby daily, but after a few seconds i realized the light was not flashing, did not have green or red lights and it was much bigger in size (the light) then i'd see on an approaching airplane.  as it passed south of my house i noticed it was pretty low (judging from what i saw of other aircraft in the area on take-off and approach) and was maybe 5000ft or lower.  it was hard to get a good view of the object as it was night time, but i noticed it made no noise as it passed (i can hear jets or smaller planes easily if they pass within a couple of km of here).  i checked flight radar and saw no planes nearby and none heading in that direction.  i then went back out with my camera to try and take a picture and it was gone.

the things that stood out to me were the colour (very bright, pure white, but not too strong as to hurt my eyes), the apparent 'smooth' flight path (it just seemed to glide by, for lack of of a better word), the size of the light (much larger then i'd see on a commercial airplane) and the lack of noise.  i thought maybe it was a satellite, but i've seen many in the past and this was many magnitudes of size larger and brighter.
content.summary: Bright, almost pure white orb smoothly and quietly traveled at what appeared to be a straight line and low altitude (5000ft maybe) overhead.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in the street getting ready to get in my car, i looked across the street and in the driveway i seen heat waves in a localized oval shaped area 34in x 20in 2 feet off the ground 20 to 25 feet from me this went on for about a 1 1/2 min. i was thinking about going over and touching it. when i started for it the heat waves stopped and the area filled with hundreds of little vortexes. this went on for 30 seconds or more then the vortexes like sucked in a dark smoke it happened in a second. then it stayed where it was 2 feet off the ground for another 20 seconds with the dark smoke swirling in side of it. then out of the front part of it (a leg i guess you would call it) protruded out of it. then it planted it on the ground and a protrusion came out the back side, and it ran like a dog across the street in front of me. then ran down the sidewalk for a block and a half   out of my sight. i can show you where it happened  on google earth street view  and draw a sketch .  im not sure what it was to me i think that's how an  advanced civilization  would send something. or im going mad. i was not drinking or using drugs it was daylight no swamp gas, i know what a dog looks like it was no dog,  i could be seeing things. i can't prove it and i cant find any thing like what i seen on line.
content.summary: I seen a oval localized disturbance

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from my mom's house. i let my girl drive and as we pulled on fm78 i noticed a black shape in a cloudless sky i began recording it shortly after but did not want to pull over to study it better. i know i should have..
content.summary: Driving with my girlfriend in a car, and noticed a shape in the sky so i recorded it.

content.detailedDescription: Outside having a smoke.  west/north west looked up and saw a formation of close to diamond shape hovering then quick departure to vanish.  followed by another group not seemingly in a formation but same yello/amber color catching up with no sound and even quicker pace.  fair visibility just a bit above the horizon.   friend with me couldn't believe her eyes either.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Hover in formation, disappear after super quick take off.  followed by another group

content.detailedDescription: was looking at the full moon when i looked up i zoomed in on my iphone and saw this object in the sky.It was a blue green sphere with what looked like pulsating lights. and it look like it was hovering then changed directions. the video could not capture it nerdy well except for a few seconds. i had to go inside so had to stop recording but felt it was very interesting.
content.summary: Was looking at full moon with phone when i zoomed in saw this sphere. it was stationary and looked like it was pulsating blue green . took a video which was faint but when zoomed in can see outlines ne and then becomes clearer. some man cement noted

content.detailedDescription: What at first seemed like a large star moved across the sky at high speed. much faster than a plane but appeared at a similar altitude. it then appeared to slow, then just disappeared. cloud cover was zero.
content.summary: High altitude, star like, moving much faster than a plane. suddenly disappeared. zero cloud cover.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at a dog park at approximately 5:30 pm on saturday evening, october 15th. i had been there a short while (approx. 25 minutes) when someone alerted myself and other patron of the park that there had been a few break-ins. 

after arriving at my vehicle, and being on the telephone with my insurance agent for approx 30 minutes, i was looking in the sky at passing planes (which is a normal thing as atlanta's airport is within 12 miles of this location) and i observed a light in the sky that was not flashing. because there were other planes at various altitudes, i paid attention to this object to ensure that i was not looking at a plane headed straight at me, thus me only seeing it's headlight. i watched the object almost straight up in the sky, continue to move n, towards the airport for about 10 seconds. once i realized that i was looking at a ufo, i shouted to some of the other dog owners also there, that i was looking at a ufo. as i said this, it was fading out, and then just disappeared. i do not believe it was a meteorite because it was travelling at cruise speed, the same speed that a plane would...
content.summary: Star-like light slowly moving in the sky. changed shape, then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Sighting on saturday, october 15, 2016:

at approximately 7:40 pm est i heard an extremely loud, very low-flying helicopter somewhere over the woods behind my apartment in the southern area of nashua which is not at all a normal occurrence here.

my wife and two sons were present; we were getting ready to eat dinner. we grew increasingly alarmed as the helicopters sound grew louder and louder until we could feel the building vibrating from it. my oldest son (14) and i stepped out onto the balcony to look for the helicopter  it sounded like it was practically on top of us, but too low and close to see it over the tree line. it was dark, the full moon was still on the opposite horizon behind our building.

my first thought was that it might be the police tracking someone on the ground in the woods, except this helicopter was so loud  sounded more like a black hawk than the standard choppers that police/news uses. and we couldnt see searchlights of any kind over the woods. 

suddenly we saw a reddish/orange light break over the tree line headed south. our balcony faces west and this light was running straight & perpendicular across our view. it was a large orb shape, flying very fast in a perfectly straight line  skimming above the trees no more than a few hundred feet off the ground, and a few hundred yards from us. we had a clear view of it for just a couple of seconds before it was lost behind the trees again. it didnt weave or change course, didnt wobble, or change colors/size/shape. there were no other lights on it, and it didnt appear to pulse. 

following just behind it was a large helicopter which appeared to be pursuing the object. the helicopter appeared military in design and was large and dark colored, either black or gray with only a couple of small red lights on it and no visible markings that i could see.

the orb appeared to accelerate slightly while it was in view but then backed off a bit, as if it was trying to stay just out of reach of the helicopter. we had a clear view of both the object and the chopper together in the sky for a moment, and the orb appeared to be about 1/3 to  as large as the helicopter. 

the whole incident lasted no more than about 30-45 seconds from first hearing the helicopter to when the object and helicopter disappeared over the trees headed south. the object and helicopter were visible for just a couple seconds of that time. 

it sounds strange, but i felt a palpable sense of intelligence/awareness from the craft in the moment the object was visible that stuck with me long after the sighting. it was like time just stopped for an instant as we watched. my son experienced the same sensation. i almost couldn't believe what my own eyes were seeing, but it was as if the craft was toying with the helicopter. we were awestruck, and were desperately wishing wed had a clearer view above the tree line for a better look at it!
content.summary: Fast-moving red/orange orb being pursued by large black helicopter

content.detailedDescription: Upon seeing this golden bell and its hand hammered riveted body ascend and descend to hide from nine drone aircraft less than 100 feet up i grabbed my shotgun in fear. drones and fighter jets came after this golden bell and it was able to evade them. i called the airforce base told them to send some help out to my location but to my surprise....No help for me and was told nothing not even a fighter jet was there but they lied to me....I'm looking at it and nine drones three f16 jets on the phone the lady and the man both lied to me both calls. only in state and country danger is there fighter jets deployment she said........A ten square mile flight path quarantine was put in place and lasted nearly two week's. fittingly the neighborhood was full of strange vehicles blue vans black trucks tinted windows very unusual traffic.... all public and commercial airlines were not allowed in flight zone. now since that day and not before my entire ten mile square grid surrounding my property and home is littered with drones daily and nightly. i just wish it was like it used to be i miss my blue sky without 3 drones flying over every 5 minutes of the day and night. i miss the good old days when a coke was a coke.
content.summary: Solid gold bell shape with clearly hand hammered rivets all around it. the hammer marks were clearly visible from the ground just above small treetops.
